mapper.sql: SELECT MSGID msgId, BATCHID batchId, SRCFILEPATH srcFilePath, DESTFILEPATH destFilePath, LOCALFILEPATH localFilePath, FILENAME fileName, FILEPROCSTATUS fileProcStatus, LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM pay_batch_checkfilelist
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO pay_batch_checkfilelist( MSGID, BATCHID, SRCFILEPATH, DESTFILEPATH, LOCALFILEPATH, FILENAME, FILEPROCSTATUS, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME ) VALUE (#{msgId}, #{batchId}, #{srcFilePath}, #{destFilePath}, #{localFilePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileProcStatus}, #{lastUpDate}, #{lastUpTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE pay_batch_checkfilelist SET SRCFILEPATH = #{srcFilePath}, DESTFILEPATH = #{destFilePath}, LOCALFILEPATH = #{localFilePath}, FILEPROCSTATUS = #{fileProcStatus}, LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime} WHERE MSGID = #{msgId} AND BATCHID = #{batchId} AND FILENAME = #{fileName}
UPDATE pay_batch_checkfilelist SET LOCALFILEPATH = #{localFilePath}, FILEPROCSTATUS = #{fileProcStatus}, LASTUPDATE = #{lastUpDate}, LASTUPTIME = #{lastUpTime} WHERE FILENAME = #{fileName}
